snippet: The weather was dull and wet but that did not stop a beaming Stan Wawrinka from having plenty of fun on Sunday as he enjoyed a mid-match rally with a ballboy before twirling 360 degrees on court to take a selfie-video with 10,000 French Open spect...
lead_paragraph: The weather was dull and wet but that did not stop a beaming Stan Wawrinka from having plenty of fun on Sunday as he enjoyed a mid-match rally with a ballboy before twirling 360 degrees on court to take a selfie-video with 10,000 French Open spectators.

headline.print_headline: Wawrinka Keeps Up Winning Run to Reach Paris Quarters
headline.main: Wawrinka Keeps Up Winning Run to Reach Paris Quarters
